a: By catching Pokemon, you increase the profitability of your Gyms. Pokemon work on an open-ended contract and accept payment in coins.
Coins are used to hire new employees and upgrade your Gym. You can buy them for Pokemon
Your Gyms generate income in money. You can freely exchange your money for Poketrum at any time without fees.
The better the Gym, the more profit it brings.

Revenue from all Gyms goes to the money basket every hour. Collecting profits every day, you will receive money in your account.It is important to collect income daily; otherwise, you may lose part of the profit
